bibliography:

145–56.

Ariew, Roger and Peter Barker (eds.), 1990, Pierre Duhem:

and (3).

–––, 1988, The Physicist as Artist: the landscapes

–––, 1982, “Saving Duhem and Galileo,”

–––, 1991, Pierre Duhem: Philosophy and History in

–––, 1991, “The Trouble with Authority: the

–––, 1996, “Substitution: Duhem’s Explication

Paul, Harry W., 1979, The Edge of Contingency, French Catholic

Quine, W. V. O., 1953, “Two Dogmas of Empiricism,”

Stoffel, Jean-François, 1995, “L’histoire des

–––, 1996, Pierre Duhem et ses

–––, 2002, Le
